A letter from St. Omers to a friend in London B. B.
4 p.
Printed for Langley Curtis ..., London : [1681?]
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. Caption title. Attributed to B.B. cf. BM. Place of publication and publisher statement taken from colophon. Publication date taken from text. Signed: B.B. On last page: St. Omers June the 5th. Stil. Nov. 1681.
